name: Dimenders
description:
Contact: remillepattesstudio@gmail.com

Description


Dimenders is an online horror game playable in cooperative mode up to 4 players. You play as a team, recruited to investigate on the emergence of portals linked to other dimensions. Your job is to solve different puzzles in order to find a way to close all the portails. In fact their emergence allowed wicked entities to flood our world. Be aware, they will try to stop you, at all cost ! Pace all the levels at the risk of your own life ! Will you manage to close all portals, avoid the entities and resolve all riddles ?

Features


Here are some features that you will find in the game :
  • Inventory : Stock in your inventory useful items in order to progress and help yourself during your missions.
  • Stamina : Keep an eye on your stamina to avoid being out of breath.
  • Respawning : Use crystals to come back to life, share them with your friends to help each other.
  • Travel : Travel through dimensions keeping all your items with you.
  • Proximity chat : Chat in-game with your friends.

Entities


In the dimensions that you explore, You will find multiples entities.
They act differently in order to neutralize you. Don't get caught !

Content


Dimenders is currently composed of 4 levels including one optionnal level.
Each one of them will set you in a different atmosphere. You might move to a completely different environnement or land in totally unknown grounds.
There are two different endings.

Puzzles


Plenty of puzzles are set in the game. They show off multiple and original game play mechanics.
The levels will adjust to the number of players, and the puzzles will change from game to game!

Roadmap


New levels, puzzles and dangers will be added incrementally.
Existing game mechanics might be reworked.
